info.name: Transaction Inquiry API Egypt
info.description: This API collection facilitates interactions with the PayMob transaction service. It offers methods to query transaction details using various identifiers such as _**merchant order ID**_, _**PayMob order ID**_, or _**PayMob transaction ID**_. These endpoints enable verification of transactions, status checks, and retrieval of associated information.

header.description: Specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

request.description: Endpoint to generate an authentication token. Replace `{BASE_URL}` with the base URL of the corresponding region you're integrated in. **Regions:** - KSA BASE_URL: [https://ksa.paymob.com](https://ksa.paymob.com) - EGY BASE_URL: [https://accept.paymob.com](https://accept.paymob.com) - UAE BASE_URL: [https://uae.paymob.com](https://uae.paymob.com) - OMN BASE_URL: [https://oman.paymob.com](https://oman.paymob.com) - PAK BASE_URL: [https://pakistan.paymob.com](https://pakistan.paymob.com) This token must be included in the headers of subsequent API requests. Within the Body, replace the `{API_KEY}` with your account API Key which can be found in the settings tab upon logging in into your account through: **Regions:** - KSA Portal: [KSA Paymob Portal](https://ksa.paymob.com/portal2/en/login) - EGY Portal: [EGP Paymob Portal](https://accept.paymob.com/portal2/en/home) - UAE Portal: [UAE Paymob Portal](https://uae.paymob.com/portal2/en/home) - OMN Portal: [OMN Paymob Portal](https://oman.paymob.com/portal2/en/home) - PAK Portal: [PAK Paymob Portal](https://pakistan.paymob.com/portal2/en/home)

request.description:
Endpoint to retrieve transaction details using the merchant's order ID. Ensure you have a valid authentication token (`AUTH_TOKEN`) and the correct merchant order ID.

**Query by Merchant Order ID**

- **Endpoint:** `/api/ecommerce/orders/transaction_inquiry`
    
- **Method:** POST
    
- **Description:** Retrieves transaction details using the merchant's unique order ID.
    
- **Parameters:**
    
    - `merchant_order_id`: The unique identifier assigned to the transaction by the merchant.

header.description: Specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

request.description:
Endpoint to retrieve transaction details using the PayMob order ID. Ensure you have a valid authentication token (`AUTH_TOKEN`) and the correct PayMob order ID.

**Query by PayMob Order ID**

- **Endpoint:** `/api/ecommerce/orders/transaction_inquiry`
    
- **Method:** POST
    
- **Description:** Fetches transaction details using the unique PayMob order ID.
    
- **Parameters:**
    
    - `ACCEPT_ORDER_ID`: The unique identifier assigned to the transaction by PayMob.

header.description: Specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

request.description:
Endpoint to retrieve transaction details using the transaction ID. Replace `{{transaction_ID}}` with the actual transaction ID you want to query. Ensure you have a valid authentication token (`AUTH_TOKEN`).

**Query by PayMob Transaction ID**

- **Endpoint:** `/api/acceptance/transactions/{{transaction_ID}}`
    
- **Method:** GET
    
- **Description:** Retrieves transaction details using the unique PayMob transaction ID.
    
- **Parameters:**
    
    - `transaction_ID`: The unique identifier assigned to the specific transaction by PayMob.
